attributes.action: Make morotway services and Truckstops safer for us Lorry drivers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Truck drivers up and down the country are risking their lives when they park in laybys and services for there 45 minute break or there daily rest ... All were trying to do is a job and deliver the goods to the place of destination so that they can be distributed into shops for consumers to buy..
Many drivers are getting hijacked or their curtains on trailers cut open and nothing is getting done to protect us even though were classed as soft targets by the police

So come on the goverment all were asking is for safer places for us to stop at so were not hijacked or robbed of our load and ending up traumitised for the rest of our lives
